colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (SPYIR KLU GTOR THABS YOD MED LA BLTAS NA'ANG, DPAL LDAN SA SKYA PA'I PHYAG LEN GYIS KAR CHA BZHI NANG GI ,KLU GTOR RGYUN DU MDZAD CING PHAN YON CHE BAS, 'PHAGS PA RIN PO CHE DANG RGYAL SRAS THOGS MED BZANG PO DPAL SOGS RNAMS KYI YIG CHA NAS, RJES SHAR KHANG PA SHEN RGYAL MTSAN GYI GSAL BAR MDZAD PA NI YI GE LAS PHYUNG STE, RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I PHAN BDE LEGS BSHAD GLING PA'I RGYUN KHYER DU ZA HOR GYI BANDHE BKOD PA'I YI GE PA NI GNAS BSTAN 'JAM DBYANGS GRAGS PA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
